name: KLOBOOM - Collision Based Puzzle Game
description:
What do you get when you mix explosions, collisions and puzzles --> KLOBOOM.

Test your skill, memory and reflexes to the limit with over 40+ levels and counting. This is a puzzle game based on physics and colliding objects.

In this game you have draggable objects named KLOBs which look like:

And you have KLOBIES which look like:

The game is all about colliding Klobs into Klobies to make sure all the Klobs+Klobies on your screen dissapear but certain rules apply and certain events occur with certain collisions, which you have to be wary of.

This game started of as part of MyFirstGameJam Winter 2018 and has evolved ever since.  My aim is too release this fully before th end of June.

Have a go. Let me know if you can finish all 40+ puzzles - I would love to know. Also, any feedback will be massively appreciated.

(I will upload MAC and Linux versions soon)
